'''Ashampoo Burning Studio''' is a [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by Ashampoo, it is one of the most used alternatives to [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows, but still not as popular as the later. <br />
+
'''Ashampoo Burning Studio''' is one of the most known products of Ashampoo, it is an [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by Ashampoo, it is one of the most used alternatives to [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows, but still not as popular as the later. <br />
It's main advantage is that it is a simple program, lightweight, and very easy to use <ref>http://news.softpedia.com/news/CDRWIN-vs-Ashampoo-Burning-Studio-38925.shtml</ref> but that is also one of its weakness: it does not contain lots of extras like [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]], and is not targeted at power-users. <br />
It's main advantage is that it is a simple program, lightweight, and very easy to use <ref>http://news.softpedia.com/news/CDRWIN-vs-Ashampoo-Burning-Studio-38925.shtml</ref> but that is also one of its weakness: it does not contain lots of extras like [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]], and is not targeted at power-users. <br />
It is capable of creating compilation of CD's, DVD's and Blu-Ray Dics.<br />
It is capable of creating compilation of CD's, DVD's and Blu-Ray Dics.<br />
